scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Amanda McGill
scrape.text:
I'm finding it hard to rate and review this novel, so I'm going to do point form for the good and the bad.
The Good: - An interesting/different novel - Read in 1 day over 2 sittings, couldn't put it down - Liked the concept and layout - Liked how things (and people) weren't how they appeared to be
The Bad: - The characters!! - The storyline - The ending - The characters!
4 vs. 4- I'm rating this one right down the middle, 3 stars.
